fields.name: Options
fields.description: The export template options. A CSV-formatted list containing zero or more of the following: 'IncludeParameterDefaultValue', 'IncludeComments', 'SkipResourceNameParameterization', 'SkipAllParameterization'

fields.name: Resources
fields.description: The IDs of the resources to filter the export by. To export all resources, supply an array with single entry '*'.
